name: Manan Batra
title: Full Stack Web Developer
summary: Full Stack Web Developer specializing in the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express, React, Node.js). Experienced in designing and delivering scalable, user-focused web applications. Skilled in building dynamic interfaces, engineering robust backends, and ensuring seamless full-stack functionality. Demonstrated ability to collaborate in team environments, implement best coding practices, and deliver high-quality solutions that drive user engagement and satisfaction. Experienced in resolving technical challenges, collaborating in cross-functional teams, and consistently delivering projects on time while adapting to fast-paced environments.

experience.title: Software Developer Intern
highlights: Developed and deployed a full-stack Grievance Assistant with ticket-based tracking and AI analytics, improving efficiency by 25%.
Automated weekly reporting with Selenium and cron jobs, reducing manual effort by 80%.
Implemented CI/CD pipelines for seamless deployments and developed a QR-based event system.

experience.title: Full-Stack Web Developer
highlights: Collaborated with the core product team to design and develop responsive web applications across User, Client, and Admin platforms, reducing user wait times by 20–30% through optimized full-stack flows.
Gained hands-on experience with the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express, React, Node.js), building scalable, reusable components and robust APIs.
Worked on integrating backend APIs with frontend interfaces to improve state management, delivering a smoother and more seamless user experience.

experience.title: Subject Matter Expert
highlights: Delivered 200+ academic solutions across Computer Science subjects, improving student comprehension by 25%.
Created and reviewed 100+ structured study materials aligned with curriculum standards.
Increased course satisfaction ratings by 30% and supported higher completion rates through clear explanations.

projects.name: ViewTube ~ YouTube Clone
projects.description: Implemented real-time video streaming with API integration and optimized data fetching, resulting in 30% faster load times and improved user retention by 40%. Developed responsive UI with Tailwind CSS, ensuring accessibility compliance and increasing cross-device compatibility by 25%.
bullets: Built a YouTube clone with video streaming and API integration
Achieved 30% faster load times through optimized data fetching
Improved user retention by 40% with enhanced UX design
Developed responsive UI with Tailwind CSS for cross-device compatibility

projects.name: Movie Recommendation System
projects.description: Designed and deployed a high-performance movie recommendation API, cutting server response time by 50% through backend optimizations. Developed advanced predictive models that improved recommendation accuracy by 30%.
bullets: Built a high-performance movie recommendation system with advanced algorithms
Reduced server response time by 50% through backend optimizations
Improved recommendation accuracy by 30% using predictive models
Integrated RESTful APIs for seamless data exchange

projects.name: Portfolio Website
projects.description: A personal portfolio website designed to showcase skills, projects, and experience. Built with React and Tailwind CSS for a modern, responsive look.
bullets: Designed and developed a modern portfolio website to showcase projects and skills
Built with React and Tailwind CSS for responsive design
Integrated Framer Motion for smooth animations and transitions
